resources.string:
Privacy Policy for Brunch
This Privacy Policy describes how our Brunch App (the "App") collects, uses, and discloses information about you.
Information Collection and Use
The App does not collect any personal information about you. You do not need to sign up or log in to use the App, and we do not collect any information about your use of the App.
The App compresses images that you select on your device. The compressed images are stored on your device, and we do not access, collect, or store any information about the images or their contents.
Information Sharing
We do not share any information about you or your use of the App with any third parties.
Security
We take reasonable measures to protect the security of the information that you provide to us. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.
Changes to this Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

About Us
Welcome to our image compressor tool (Brunch)! My name is Lucky, and I am the creator of this app.
I built this tool as a personal project to learn more about app development and to have some fun along the way. I have always been interested in technology and programming, and this project was a great opportunity for me to explore these passions.
Our image compressor tool is designed to be simple and easy to use. It allows you to compress images on your device quickly and efficiently, without the need for any complicated settings or configurations.
We are committed to providing a high-quality app that meets the needs of our users. We are constantly working to improve our tool and add new features, so please feel free to share your feedback with us.
Thank you for choosing our image compressor tool. We hope you enjoy using it as much as we enjoyed building it!
